cobblemon.species.flosile.name: Flosile
cobblemon.species.flosile.desc: Known for keeping flowers intact, its tail can power by photosynthesis.
cobblemon.species.salile.name: Salile
cobblemon.species.shamander.name: Shamander
cobblemon.species.stoake.name: Stoake
cobblemon.species.stoake.desc: May look dangerous, but is docile to humans, known for keeping both itself and humans warm.
cobblemon.species.magmink.name: Magmink
cobblemon.species.magmink.desc: It burns anything in its presence, keeping a Magmink at bay is a hard task.
cobblemon.species.volcarine.name: Volcarine
cobblemon.species.volcarine.desc: It can run as fast as a race car, and yet, its speed can be as fast as a speeding rocket and will ram at its enemies which it can create fire explosion on impact.
cobblemon.species.moulash.name: Moulash
cobblemon.species.moulash.desc: Known for excellent eyesight, it is known for heeding warning, it really hates Wingulls.
cobblemon.species.blundertross.name: Blundertross
cobblemon.species.albacannon.name: Albacannon
cobblemon.species.xylobone.name: Xylobone
cobblemon.species.xylobone.desc: Xylobone are often considered creepy, but also sort of cute in its own way. The music it makes on its ribs makes it a popular novelty Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.dethmantle.name: Dethmantle
cobblemon.species.dethmantle.desc: Dethmantle is dubbed as the 'Demon of Death Metal' by musicians, since its bass sound can create unnatural bizarre vibes.
cobblemon.species.babeau.name: Babeau
cobblemon.species.babeau.desc: What looks like a shirt and pants are actually just thick fur, allowing it to thrive in freezing temperatures. Trainers unfamiliar with the Pokemon assume it's just a human boy.
cobblemon.species.babeaux.name: Babeau
cobblemon.species.babeaux.desc: It may look like its freezing, it is actually gathering power to freeze things.
cobblemon.species.karatage.name: Karatage
cobblemon.species.karatage.desc: Karatage has been known for being the excellent display by physical education teachers for high school students. Can break 50 planks in one force palm.
cobblemon.species.karatage_fratzki.desc: Babeau has been amalgamated with a fragment of a T-Meteorite, and evolved into this Karatage that creates an energy disc that it can cut through titanium like paper.
cobblemon.species.yandement.name: Yandement
cobblemon.species.yandement.desc: Its behavior is quite pitless, It is also seen being alone at night. Some people and Pokémon can be intimidated by looking at Yandement.
cobblemon.species.yandement_fratzki.desc: Its titanium arm has plasma energy that allows it to shoot at its enemy through their weak points without a miss. Yandement can be arrogant, but is quite a mastermind.
cobblemon.species.glideau.name: Glideau
cobblemon.species.glideau.desc: His body is squishy, able to withstand long falls, allowing it to glide down tall buildings. It prefers soft landings regardless.
cobblemon.species.glideaux.name: Glideau
cobblemon.species.glideaux.desc: A different Glideau from an unknown dimension. It creates a sky-blue aurora so beautiful, but is a trap to signal for the X Pokemon to attack.
cobblemon.species.mykeau.name: Mykeau
cobblemon.species.mykeau.desc: It's believed to actually be a big parasitic fungi that took the Babeau like plague, however, scientist have revealed that it's actually the child who farmed the fungi to protect from predators.
cobblemon.species.babette.name: Babette
cobblemon.species.babette.desc: What looks like a shirt and skirt are actually just thick fur, allowing it to thrive in freezing temperatures. Trainers unfamiliar with the Pokemon assume it's just a human girl.
cobblemon.species.babettex.name: Babette
cobblemon.species.babettex.desc: No matter how moddy this one is, the more angrier it gets, the more hotter the body becomes.
cobblemon.species.sailine.name: Sailine
cobblemon.species.sailine.desc: Sailine are said to have fast enough reflexes to catch a bullet between their fingers. They use these reflexes in battles to make themselves hard to hit.
cobblemon.species.sailine_fratzki.desc: As a mutation from the S-Meteorite, it is quite bratty and rude to others. The only downside is it lacks physical strength, but now it has greater control over gravity, allowing it to hover.
cobblemon.species.sailine_bond.desc: A grieved Sailine who came from the future had worn variety of parts how Cyra and his Pokémons were long-deceased in its own timeline.
cobblemon.species.yanditrix.name: Yanditrix
cobblemon.species.yanditrix.desc: Yanditrix loves being in crush with its trainer, but whenever it sees a female Pokémon getting along with it, It will fight it without mercy.
cobblemon.species.yanditrix_fratzki.desc: Yanditrix appears to be quite playful and shows no danger toward humans and children, A meteorite amalgamated into it developed a stable mentality.
cobblemon.species.cryomette.name: Cryomette
cobblemon.species.cryomette.desc: It possesses the power to manipulate ice, but unless it learned something else as a Babette that's all it can do. It has a reputation of being stupid for this reason.
cobblemon.species.cryomettex.name: Cryomette
cobblemon.species.cryomettex.desc: A different Cryomette from an unknown dimension. Its body emits a heatwave to the point the interior bursts into flames.
cobblemon.species.oniette.name: Oniette
cobblemon.species.oniette.desc: When extremely frightened, arm-like shadowy protrusions pierce from two openings on its back and attack the foe's soul.
cobblemon.species.pixight.name: Pixight
cobblemon.species.pixight.desc: Often found in Xetopia's own forests being the tiniest Pokémon, a group of pixights are seen dancing around the tree in peace.
cobblemon.species.pixightx.name: Pixight
cobblemon.species.luminix.name: Luminix
cobblemon.species.luminix.desc: As it got slightly bigger upon evolving, it often likes to dance on top of a tree, It glows brighter as its happiness grows greater.
cobblemon.species.luminixx.name: Luminix
cobblemon.species.sparkless.name: Sparkless
cobblemon.species.sparkless.desc: It is known to keep forest from harm, It shines itself for a signal to send help to this forest, just as bright as a sun.
cobblemon.species.sparklessx.name: Sparkless
cobblemon.species.linernel.name: Linernel
cobblemon.species.linernel.desc: Linernel is quite a smart Pokémon, leaving tasks to be easier for people.
cobblemon.species.linernel_valhansen.des: This variant is often owned by lots of trainers because it is quite popular than its Xetopian variant.
cobblemon.species.debiave.name: Debiave
cobblemon.species.debiave.desc: Its inteligence skyrockets that it can try to outthink human standard, due to being man-made, it still cared so much about humans.
cobblemon.species.ubunitual.name: Ubunitual
cobblemon.species.ubunitual.desc: Its development originates from the Isle of Armor 15 years ago, As of result, this Pokémon is now easily trainable by human trainers.
cobblemon.species.gentone.name: Gentone
cobblemon.species.gentone.desc: Known to be quite a babysitter, it detects dangers from miles away in order to keep a young human safe from harm.
cobblemon.species.sabylon.name: Sabylon
cobblemon.species.sabylon.desc: It is shown to rescue lost children in danger and it tries to fend off wild pokemon that are aggressive to Humans, its claw projection can cut through anything hard as metal.
cobblemon.species.auroncer.name: Auroncer
cobblemon.species.auroncer.desc: It protects it's nation and is quite a Savior to Pokémon and Humans over 5000 years ago. Auroncer is a good friend to Ajitryon.
cobblemon.species.auroncer_agarsa.desc: Despite being a Gardener, it is not too fond of battling, so it will try it's best to avoid any trainer battles unless anything means necessary to protect Agarsa.
cobblemon.species.doshell.name: Doshell
cobblemon.species.doshell.desc: During the early days after Darshell, it was becoming a sucess. It is known to keep tasks more easier for Humans.
cobblemon.species.windoware.name: Windoware
cobblemon.species.windoware.desc: It's sponsored by a company and it's the most popular OS Pokémon all around the world, MS Pendrives are always in high demand.
cobblemon.species.darshell.name: Darshell
cobblemon.species.darshell.desc: It is known as the first OS pokemon evolved from Linernel before Doshell during the development. It is known to be the farmer's best helper.
cobblemon.species.machintech.name: Machintech
cobblemon.species.machintech.desc: Machintech are excellent for production, it has a rivalry with Windoware despite being outpopulated.
cobblemon.species.appladoo.name: Appladoo
cobblemon.species.appladoo.desc: Though it looks like Pumpkaboo, Appladoo is a completely different species. A sight of it will make the harvest the best of the year.
cobblemon.species.ringousine.name: Ringousine
cobblemon.species.buizel_valhansen.desc: It has a very curious and energetic personality, being used in kindergarten schools to teach young children how to swim.
cobblemon.species.floatzel_valhansen.des: Has a very extraordinary skill on performing tricks with balls with its tail, though it also shows interest in hobbies, such as dexterity toys.
cobblemon.species.ringousine.desc: It's able to resolve complex mathematic calculations due to the outstanding grass fibers of vegetable cells of neuronal connections inside. Having a Ringousine will guarantee a good harvest.
cobblemon.species.teentric.name: Teentric
cobblemon.species.teentric.desc: Teentric is a sour-tasting Pokemon and uses this fact to deter predators. This can change based on berries it eats, but in a pinch, it can be made sweet by boiling it.
cobblemon.species.lemion.name: Lemion
cobblemon.species.lemion.desc: Lemion can generate an electric barrier that can magnetize and attract any iron object at its radius, including Steel-type Pokémon, which involuntarily leads to dangerous territorial fights with Aggron.
cobblemon.species.oracket.name: Oracket
cobblemon.species.oracket.desc: Oracket has an innate passion for hitting balls, that likely inspired the tennis sport. The balls it hits destroy rocks with a mystic power.
cobblemon.species.swilime.name: Swilime
cobblemon.species.swilime.desc: It's playful with the volleyball bubble it can make, it's been a master of beach activities with children. Swilime has a feisty temper that only a talented trainer can overcome it.
cobblemon.species.graspeed.name: Graspeed
cobblemon.species.graspeed.desc: Always on its grapefruit wheels, Graspeed skates with a speedy passion, able to reach kilometers that almost break the sound barrier. There have been recordings of Graspeed singing in human-like language when it's in a good mood.
cobblemon.species.liength.name: Liength
cobblemon.species.liength.desc: Liength likes to roar against stronger Pokémon as a way to challenge them since it ignores the danger. It constantly lifts boulders that are twice its size.
cobblemon.species.manixie.name: Manixie
cobblemon.species.manixie.desc: Manixie was barely visible during ancient times, it was thought to be a sprite of the woods. Likes to prank people often.
cobblemon.species.manixie_mystical.desc: Ancient stories tell about this Pokemon being in the company of a Manaight and Managic, who fought ancient evil that forged a flying fortress.
cobblemon.species.soaringkite.name: Soaring Kite
cobblemon.species.soaringkite.desc: It has similar features to a grassy pterosaur that was covered in a paranormal magazine, but the two have little else in common.
cobblemon.species.forteleo.name: Forte Leo
cobblemon.species.forteleo.desc: It resembles a mysterious Pokémon described in a paranormal magazine as the primal Liength from one billion years ago.
cobblemon.species.spritepixel.name: Sprite Pixel
cobblemon.species.spritepixel.desc: It resembles a Pokémon from a paranormal magazine that mentions a video game mascot that became popular enough to be mass produced as merchandise toy.
Evolve Babeau and Babette into each 4 different forms
advancements.cobblemon.catch_beastfamily: Catch Liength, Manixie, Cowble, and Blissprit
advancements.cobblemon.alteia_catch.desc: Catch both Mystical Manixie and Broken Bond Sailine
